string.name: name
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter 2

string.name: parent
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter

Amazingly, Ayan recovered from amnesia with the help of the toy sword. That's just amazing!!! The only thing left now is for Ayan and Bruce to finally meet up, but first, I got to get this letter from Ayan to Bruce.
I'm so glad that Ayan got her memory back. I'm even gladder that Bruce got to finally see his daughter again! What a moment...
Please give this letter to my dad! I really mean it! I can't wait to meet my dad again!
Oh ... that's ... my ... daughter ... indeed ... I ... can't believe it ... I don't think I have ever been so happy in my life ... thank you so much.
I am so glad my daughter is alive and well! I have to make my way there now. I cannot wait to see her. Here's some money for your traveling expense. It may not be much, but please take it.
This is too good to be true!
Please take care of it! I'll write it again here. Don't lose it this time!
